ygData.subject: Mistmoore strategies?
ygData.msgSnippet: My guild is planning an event in Mistmoore and I am part of the planning process.  Most of the players will be mid 20s to mid 30s but we ll have a few 50+
ygData.messageBody:
My guild is planning an event in Mistmoore and I am
part of the planning process. Most of the players
will be mid 20s to mid 30s but we'll have a few 50+
folks there too.

Current planning strategy is to line up 3-4 strong
groups near the zone and have an experienced puller
(or two) bring mobs to the zone.

THe idea is to open a pathway to those mobs and items
we want, then move our camping groups down the open
path and into those areas we want.

I've never been to mistmoore before....is there a
better way to do this?

Thanks,

Tyunes of Rodcet Nife
